channel.title: Compiling error [508]
channel.description: I set my paths right, now when I try to compile, I get this [code]The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Yeah I know it says there's no bin there, but there is.. I looked. Here's my compiler: [code]@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause[/code]

item.title: Compiling error [508]
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

I set my paths right, now when I try to compile, I get this

The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ///bin/ Press any key to continue . . .
Yeah I know it says there’s no bin there, but there is… I looked. Here’s my compiler:

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" -cp . -D ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause
